### Completion Criteria   

<!--- How will we know when this is done?
please use boxes like
for a bug:
* [ ] Now I can [topic of question / bug]
for a discussion:
* [ ] Discuss and develop requirements docs; create issues for next steps
for a new feature
* [ ] create algorithm
* [ ] write test
* [ ] add to pipeline
--->
